div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Organization` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Organization`. Element `Organization` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.active`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.type`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.name` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.name`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.alias` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.alias`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.description` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.
Element `Organization.contact` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.contact`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.partOf` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.partOf`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.endpoint` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Organization.endpoint`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Organization.qualification` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.identifier` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Organization.qualification.identifier` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.code` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Organization.qualification.code` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.period` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Organization.qualification.period` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

Element `Organization.qualification.issuer` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Organization.qualification` requires a cross-version extension. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Organization.qualification.issuer` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Organization.qualification.issuer` has a context of Organization based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Organization`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
